product_name: Nikwax TX-Direct 2.0 Spray-On Water Repellent Treatment - 5 oz.
long_description: Nikwax TX-Direct 2.0 spray-on water repellent treatment is a safe, non-aerosol spray that restores the DWR (Durable Water Repellent) finish of your gear. Restores the water-resistant finish to all laminated and coated waterproof, breathable fabrics that begin to ''wet out'' or absorb water over time. Ideal for jackets with wicking linings, synthetic sleeping bags, and items that can't be machine washed, such as single-wall tents and bivy sacks. Quick and easy to apply to outer surfaces; can be used anywhere, anytime, on wet and dry fabrics. Safe for use on Gore-Tex(R), REI Elements(R), Ultrex(R), Entrant(R), SympaTex(R) and eVent(R) laminate fabrics.
short_description: Nikwax TX-Direct 2.0 spray-on water repellent treatment is a safe, non-aerosol spray that restores the DWR (Durable Water Repellent) finish of your gear.
